intro.description:
To realise a Convertigo project, you have to start with creating an empty project.
The bold text in this help file is availabe in (?).

item.title: Start the creation form
item.description:
Then click succesively on:
>Menu « File »
>On « New »
>On « Project »
>On file « Convertigo Project »
>On file « Web clipping »
>On file « Web Clipping »
>On "Next"
You can realize this instructions manually (Click on "Click to skip") or automatically (Click on "Click to perform").

item.title: Follow the instructions of the form
item.description:
>Give a name to your project
>Press on "Next"
>Press on "Next"
>Put the address of the web site server (addresse until "/") to be treated in the field "HTTP Server". This address has to start with www
To evenually complete the address of the web site, go to the tab Projects view, click on the sign "+" of the project then on "+" of file "connector". Click on the connector which has appeared.
In the tab properties view change the propriaty "Root Path" and put the rest of et mettez le reste of the address of the site by starting with a "/"

item.title: First project (1)
item.description:
> Call your project "test"
> Take site www.google.com
> Put "/intl/en/" in the propriaty"Root Path"
> Remove the screen classes "GenericWebPages" and "ClippedWebPages" of file Connectors/testConnector/Screens classes/Default Screen class/Inherited screen classes
